items.text: full on middle, pushed to mid-on
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Taylor, no run

items.text: length outside off, hint of away movement, Taylor chases it tentatively and is beaten
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Taylor, no run

items.text: full outside off, punched to deep cover
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: length outside off, defended to point's right and they scamper a single
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Taylor, 1 run
Mohammad Saifuddin to Nicholls, 2 leg byes

items.text: struck on the pad, too high and perhaps pitched outside leg as he missed the flick
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Nicholls, no run

items.text: full on middle, pushed back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Nicholls, no run

items.text: full on middle, bit of swing back in again, defended back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Nicholls, no run

items.text: length on the pads, turns the face too early and gets a leading edge to cover, all along the ground, however
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Nicholls, no run

items.text: length outside off, steered to third-man
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: length on the pads, clipped away to deep squareleg
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Nicholls, 1 run

items.text: full on middle, pushed to mid-on's right
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: length on the pads, tucked away between deep squareleg and fine leg for two
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Nicholls, 2 runs

items.text: length on off, defended solidly back to the bowler
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Nicholls, no run

items.text: short and misdirected down the leg side, Nicholls just helps it along, using the pace, down to the fine-leg fence
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Nicholls, FOUR runs
Mohammad Saifuddin to Taylor, no run

items.text: full outside off, driven to deep point
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: length, wide outside off, pushed to deep cover
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Nicholls, 1 run

items.text: length, angled in, pushed to squareleg
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Taylor, no run

items.text: full outside off, driven past cover for two
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Taylor, 2 runs

items.text: full on the pads, Taylor pushes it to midwicket, it was in the air briefly but nowhere close to carrying
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Taylor, no run

items.preText: A change in commentary here as well, as Ankur takes a well deserved break. Hello everyone - Bangladesh would be pleased with their work so far. Mehidy to start from around the wicket
items.text: length ball on off, and punched off the back foot to mid-on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Nicholls, 1 run

items.preText: over the wicket to the right-handed Taylor
items.text: length ball on off, and turning inwards. Nudged off his hips to the vacant square-leg region
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: full on middle, and he taps a defensive shot down the ground to long on for a walking single
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Nicholls, 1 run

items.text: full, just outside off and a bit of offbreak. Defended with soft hands
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Taylor, no run
